products.product_title: Al Haramain Amber Oud Carbon Edition - Cologne for Men - Long Lasting Perfume for Men - Arabian Perfume - Men's Cologne - Oud Perfume - 3.4 oz
products.product_description: Al Haramain Amber Oud Carbon Edition is a sophisticated fragrance that captures the essence of timeless masculinity. This oud and amber perfume for men features an aromatic blend, starting with fresh top notes of lavender, rosemary, and bergamot, evoking a sense of calm and clarity. The heart reveals a captivating fusion of geranium, sage, and marine accord, offering an aromatic journey that feels both invigorating and comforting. Base notes of moss, cedarwood, vetiver, and amber emerge, adding depth and warmth for a scent that connects you to the earth. Crafted with the finest ingredients, this Arabian perfume for men provides a long-lasting scent experience that makes a statement wherever you go. With its elegant bottle design, Amber Oud stands as a symbol of luxury and refinement. This long-lasting perfume is an Arabic cologne for men that is both distinctive and memorable. Ideal for any occasion, from daily wear to special events, it's a fragrance that speaks of confidence, style, and a love for high-quality scents. Experience the allure of this manly fragrance that captures the spirit of Arabian perfume craftsmanship.
products.safety_information: For external use only. Avoid contact with eyes.
products.ingredients_list: Alcohol, Bht, Parfum, Ethylhexyl Methoxycinnamate, Dipropylene Glycol, Propanediol, Water, Benzyl Alcohol, Benzyl Benzoate, Benzyl Salicylate, Citral, Citronellol, Coumarin, Eugenol, Geraniol, Linalool, Alpha-isomethyl Ionone, Limonene

products.product_description: Amber Oud Bleu Edition by Al Haramain Perfumes is a fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Amber Oud Bleu Edition was launched in 2022. Top notes are Lemon, Grapefruit, Pink Pepper and Mint; middle notes are Ginger, Jasmine and Vetiver; base notes are Patchouli, Olibanum, Sandalwood and Cedar.

products.product_title: Al Haramain Amber Oud Blue Edition for Men Eau de Parfum Spray - Long Lasting Men's Cologne with Amber & Sandalwood, Arabian Perfume for Men 60ml (2.0 oz)
products.product_description: Vibrant & Invigorating Opening: A fresh, zesty blend of grapefruit, lemon, pink pepper, and mint creates an energetic and uplifting introduction, perfect for an immediate burst of freshness. Spicy-Warm Heart with Floral Depth: Ginger adds a spicy warmth, complemented by earthy vetiver and delicate jasmine, offering a vibrant yet elegantly balanced middle layer that intrigues the senses. Rich, Woody & Smoky Base: Anchored by sandalwood, olibanum, cedar, and patchouli, the dry-down delivers a warm, grounding, and slightly smoky finish that lingers beautifully on the skin. Dynamic & Multi-Layered Scent Profile: Expertly transitions from bright citrus top notes to a spicy-floral heart, ending with a resinous woody base?crafted for those who appreciate complexity and sophistication in a fragrance. Tradition Meets Innovation: At Al Haramain, tradition meets modern perfumery to create exceptional fragrances. From perfumes for women to men's fragrances, every detail is carefully crafted.

products.product_title: Al Haramain Amber Oud - Dubai Night - Oud Cologne for Men - Amber Perfume for Men - Long Lasting Perfume with Bergamot, Saffron Fragrances - 3.33 oz
products.product_description: Top Notes: The mens cologne opens with fresh bergamot, saffron, and elemi, creating a fresh yet spicy first impression. These top notes give the scent a balanced yet luxurious presence that suits perfumes for men. Middle Notes: Rich agarwood blends with soft Bulgarian rose and lily of the valley, making this a smooth and balanced men's cologne. Base Notes: The base of this mens cologne spray combines white musk and tonka bean with warm amber and earthy oakmoss. It gives the oud perfume for men a smooth, elegant finish. Long Lasting Perfume: This men's fragrance is made to last. A true long lasting perfume for men, it holds its scent for hours without fading. Reliable and bold, it enhances any men cologne collection. Tradition Meets Innovation: At Al Haramain, tradition meets modern perfumery to create exceptional fragrances. From perfumes for women to men's fragrances, every detail is carefully crafted.

products.product_title: Al Haramain Amber Oud Dubai Night | Oud & Amber Cologne for Men | Long-Lasting Scent with Bergamot & Saffron 60ml (2.0 oz)
products.product_description: Top Notes: This distinguished cologne opens with an invigorating blend of fresh bergamot, aromatic saffron, and resinous elemi. The combination creates a first impression that is both vibrantly fresh and intriguingly spicy, establishing a balanced and luxurious aura designed for the modern man. Middle Notes: At its heart, the fragrance reveals a harmonious blend where rich agarwood (oud) meets the delicate softness of Bulgarian rose and lily of the valley. This accord creates a deeply smooth and perfectly balanced core, characteristic of a refined men's cologne. Base Notes: The fragrance settles into a sophisticated base where clean white musk and sweet tonka bean intertwine with warm amber and earthy oakmoss. This foundation provides the oud perfume with a consistently smooth, elegant, and long-lasting finish. Long Lasting Perfume: Crafted for exceptional endurance, this is a truly long-lasting fragrance for men. It is engineered to maintain its bold character and aromatic presence reliably for hours, making it a steadfast and valuable addition to any men's cologne collection. Tradition Meets Innovation: At Al Haramain, tradition meets modern perfumery to create exceptional fragrances. From perfumes for women to men's fragrances, every detail is carefully crafted.
products.middle_notes: Agarwood (Oud), Bulgarian Rose, Lily of the Valley
products.base_notes: White Musk, Tonka Bean, Amber, Oakmoss

products.product_title: Al Haramain Amber Oud Rouge Eau de Parfum Spray for Men, 4 Ounce
products.product_description: Al Haramain Amber Oud Rouge Cologne by Al Haramain, Starting in 2018, Al Haramain has slowly been introducing a delicious collection of creamy oriental perfumes in the Amber Oud collection. In early 2020 Al Haramain Amber Oud Rouge was added to the already impressive array. The fragrance is complex and sweet, allowing it to blend in in a variety of settings. It opens with distinctive top notes of saffron and a touch of floral accents. The middle is a sweet and salty combo thanks to rich amber wood and a touch of ambergris. The base exudes the warm scent of agarwood along with a few specially-chosen woodsy scents including fir and cedar. This fragrance is easy to enjoy anytime, but is especially suited to adding spice and warmth to cool evenings.
products.safety_information: For external use only. Avoid contact with eyes. Keep away from naked flame or direct heat sources.
products.availability: Only 16 left in stock - order soon
